author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Nice that it is not the usual black suit
review:
Opening;

Joker is my second favorite figure from one of my (unpopular opinion alert) favorite CMF series .

The Minifigure-

 The Minifigure figure has a very nice hair piece of is Peter venkmens hair in spring green , the head is one sided but does have a prominent rendition of his signature smile his suit is not under detailed but is not amazing .

The accessories -

Accessories include a very nicely printed joker card and the same candy floss build that's included in the roller coaster . The stand also has the action pose piece introduced in 2020 .

In conclusion-

this is a great figure who brings a lot to the table in terms of interesting variants unlike the superman of the series .

author: Odeinoichus
title: A Joker by any other Name...
review:
Set #71026 Joker: What's the Dark Knight without his nemesis. This variant of Joker is dressed all in white, with a purple undershirt visible beneath. He includes a printed Joker card tile and a Beehive element in pink to represent a piece of cotton candy.

A truly distrubing smile graces his lips and his hair piece is quite impressive. I forget just what version this is meant to be, a highly popular one to be sure from what I can recall. Joker is a great addition to the roster of Heroes and Villains from LEGO DC Super Heroes CMF Series 1 and I hope Series 2 will some day happen to grace us with many more impressive figures. Strongly Recommended.
